item.title: ENACT project is up and running
item.description: The ENACT project is now up and running, after a kickoff meeting in Oslo with 25 attendees, representing 11 partners. Follow the news of ENACT at: http://enact-project.eu
item.dc:creator: hui

item.title: The 2nd-year review of Broker@Cloud went well
item.description: The second review of the FP7 project, Broker@Cloud, was help in Brussels on the 22nd of January. We presented our work of using Dynamic Variability Modeling to support the service failure prevention and recovery on cloud brokerage platforms, and showed a demo of the mechanism on a use case …
item.dc:creator: hui

item.title: Short Paper accepted by the NIER track of ICSE 2015
item.description: A DIVERSIFY paper titled On Architectural Diversity of Dynamic Adaptive Systems is accepted by the New Ideas and Emerging Results (NIER) track of ICSE 2015. It is a report of our New Idea to estimate the cost of adapting a running system by measure the system's diversity, which is a …
item.dc:creator: hui

item.title: Demo paper accepted at SASO 2014
item.description: A short paper, Dynamic Adaptation of the Traffic Management System CARDEMO, has been accepted at the demo track of the Eighth IEEE International Conference on Self-Adaptive and Self-Organizing Systems (SASO 2014). The paper reports our experiment to apply the constraint-based adaptation approach on a Traffic Management System. It is a …
item.dc:creator: hui

item.title: Paper accepted at MODELS 2014
item.description:
Our paper, Modelling Adaptation Policies as Domain-Specific Constraints, has been accepted by ACM/IEEE 17th International Conference on Model Driven Engineering Languages and Systems (MODELS 2014).

The paper presented our attempt to apply SMT constraint solving on dynamic system adaptation planning, in the cloud computing domain. We provide a text-based …
item.dc:creator: hui

item.title: Ran the second leg of Holmenkollstafetten relay race
item.description: According to Wikipedia, Holmenkollstafetten is the biggest relay race in the world. This year, it is said that there were almost 40k people running around the around the city of Oslo. It was an interesting experience to be one of these people. Well, I guess this was my first contribution …

item.title: Homepage Established
item.description:
After being lazy for more than half a year, I finally decided to set-up a new homepage.

Now most of the standard content in a "researcher's" homepage are there. I know it is too boring at this stage, but at least I have something to put when they want a …
